alert.note: Alert for Door; Florence; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 26 at 8:22PM CST until February 27 at 9:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow, mixed with freezing rain or sleet at times. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Door, Florence, Northern Marinette County, Northern Oconto County, Southern Marinette County, and Southern Oconto County Counties. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Door; Florence; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County; Southern Marinette County; Southern Oconto County
